Naruto Uzumaki.summary: Naruto defeats Neji in the Chunin Exam preliminaries, proving that hard work and determination can overcome natural talent and destiny.
Naruto defeats Gaara in the final round of the Chunin Exams, using the power of the Nine-Tails and his determination to save his friend.
Naruto defeats Kiba in the Chunin Exam preliminaries using an unexpected strategy involving shadow clones and a fart.
The final battle between Naruto and Sasuke at the Valley of the End, ending in a draw with both losing consciousness.
Naruto defeats Pain (Nagato) after Pain destroys Konoha, using Sage Mode and eventually convincing Nagato to revive the villagers.
Naruto defeats Kakuzu using his new Wind Release: Rasenshuriken technique, destroying Kakuzu's multiple hearts.
Naruto defeats the reanimated Third Raikage during the Fourth Great Ninja War by redirecting his own attack back at him.
Naruto, along with Sasuke and the Allied Shinobi Forces, defeats Obito after he becomes the Ten-Tails jinchuriki.
Naruto and Sasuke fight against Madara Uchiha, but the battle ends inconclusively as Kaguya appears.
Naruto and Sasuke work together to seal Kaguya Ōtsutsuki, ending the threat she posed to the world.
Naruto's first encounter with Orochimaru during the Chunin Exams, where Orochimaru places a Five Elements Seal on Naruto.
Naruto faces Kabuto during the Konoha Crush, but the battle is interrupted and ends without a clear winner.
Naruto defeats Shino in a training match, showcasing his growth and improved skills.
Naruto defeats Yamato in a training session, demonstrating his improved control over the Nine-Tails' chakra.
Naruto and Kakashi engage in a training battle, ending in a draw as both demonstrate their skills.
Naruto trains with Killer B to gain control over the Nine-Tails, with their sparring matches ending in draws.

Sasuke Uchiha.summary: The final battle between Sasuke and Naruto at the Valley of the End, ending in a draw with both losing consciousness.
Sasuke fights Haku during the Land of Waves arc, protecting Naruto and awakening his Sharingan for the first time.
Sasuke fights Gaara during the Chunin Exams, using Chidori for the first time, though the battle is interrupted.
Sasuke is defeated by Orochimaru during the Forest of Death, with Orochimaru placing a Cursed Seal on him.
Sasuke defeats Deidara using his intelligence and Sharingan abilities, forcing Deidara to use a suicide attack.
Sasuke fights his brother Itachi, but Itachi was already dying and allows Sasuke to win, revealing the truth about the Uchiha massacre.
Sasuke and his team are defeated by Killer B, with Sasuke nearly dying and needing to be saved by his teammates.
Sasuke fights the Fourth Raikage at the Five Kage Summit, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Sasuke defeats Danzō, avenging Itachi and the Uchiha clan, though Danzō uses Izanagi to survive initially.
Sasuke, with Itachi's help, defeats Kabuto using Izanami, ending the Impure World Reincarnation technique.
Sasuke and Naruto fight against Madara Uchiha, but the battle ends inconclusively as Kaguya appears.
Sasuke and Naruto work together to seal Kaguya Ōtsutsuki, ending the threat she posed to the world.
Sasuke loses to Rock Lee in a sparring match before the Chunin Exams, realizing he needs to train harder.
Sasuke defeats Sai during their first encounter, showcasing his improved skills after training with Orochimaru.
Sasuke defeats Yamato during their encounter, demonstrating his mastery of the Cursed Seal and new techniques.

Sakura Haruno.summary: Sakura and Ino fight in the Chunin Exam preliminaries, ending in a draw as both exhaust themselves.
Sakura, with Chiyo's help, defeats Sasori by destroying his core, showcasing her growth as a medical ninja.

Kakashi Hatake.summary: Kakashi defeats Zabuza in the Land of Waves arc, using his Sharingan and strategic thinking.
Kakashi is defeated by Itachi's Tsukuyomi, falling into a coma for weeks.
Kakashi fights Kakuzu, holding his own until Naruto arrives with his new technique.
Kakashi is killed by Pain's attack on Konoha, though he is later revived by Nagato.
Kakashi defeats Obito in their final battle, using Chidori to pierce Obito's heart.
Kakashi assists Naruto and Sasuke in sealing Kaguya, using his DMS abilities.
Kakashi defeats Haku during the Land of Waves arc, though Haku sacrifices himself to save Zabuza.
Kakashi fights Kisame, with the battle ending inconclusively as both demonstrate their skills.
Kakashi fights Deidara, using Kamui to counter Deidara's explosive attacks.
Kakashi and Naruto engage in training battles, ending in draws as both demonstrate their skills.

Might Guy.summary: Guy defeats Kisame multiple times, using his taijutsu skills and eventually defeating him with the Morning Peacock.
Guy opens the Eighth Gate and fights Madara, nearly defeating him before collapsing from exhaustion.
Guy and Kakashi have numerous sparring matches throughout their lives, with most ending in draws.
Guy defeats Rock Lee in training matches, teaching him the ways of taijutsu.
Guy and Neji engage in training matches, with battles ending in draws.
Guy defeats Tenten in training matches, showcasing his superior taijutsu skills.

Rock Lee.summary: Rock Lee defeats Sasuke in a sparring match before the Chunin Exams, showcasing his speed and taijutsu.
Rock Lee fights Gaara in the Chunin Exams, opening the Fifth Gate but ultimately losing.
Rock Lee fights Kimimaro while protecting Naruto, opening multiple gates but still losing.
Rock Lee and Naruto engage in training matches, with battles ending in draws.
Rock Lee loses to Neji in training matches, unable to overcome Neji's Gentle Fist style.
Rock Lee defeats Tenten in training matches, showcasing his superior taijutsu skills.

Neji Hyūga.summary: Neji defeats Hinata in the Chunin Exam preliminaries, nearly killing her before being stopped.
Neji loses to Naruto in the Chunin Exam preliminaries, with Naruto proving that hard work can overcome destiny.
Neji defeats Kidōmaru during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, using his Byakugan and Gentle Fist techniques.
Neji defeats Rock Lee in training matches, using his Gentle Fist to counter Lee's taijutsu.
Neji defeats Tenten in training matches, easily countering her weapon-based attacks.

Gaara.summary: Gaara defeats Rock Lee in the Chunin Exams, surviving Lee's Fifth Gate attack.
Gaara loses to Naruto in the final round of the Chunin Exams, changing his perspective on life.
Gaara is defeated and captured by Deidara, who uses explosives to defeat the Kazekage.
Gaara defeats Kimimaro during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, using his sand techniques.
Gaara fights the reanimated Gengetsu during the Fourth Great Ninja War, with the battle ending in a draw.
Gaara and Sasuke fight during the Chunin Exams, but the battle is interrupted.

Shikamaru Nara.summary: Shikamaru defeats Hidan by trapping him in a forest and burying him alive, avenging Asuma's death.
Shikamaru defeats Tayuya during the Sasuke Retrieval arc using his Shadow Possession technique.
Shikamaru forfeits his match against Temari in the Chunin Exams, though he could have won.

Choji Akimichi.summary: Choji defeats Jirōbō during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, using his Expansion Jutsu and nearly dying.
Choji fights Kakuzu alongside his teammates, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Choji loses to Asuma in training matches, learning from his sensei.

Ino Yamanaka.summary: Ino and Sakura fight in the Chunin Exam preliminaries, ending in a draw as both exhaust themselves.
Ino and Sai engage in training matches, with battles ending in draws.
Ino assists in the fight against Kakuzu, using her Mind Transfer technique.

Hinata Hyūga.summary: Hinata loses to Neji in the Chunin Exam preliminaries, nearly dying before being saved.
Hinata is defeated by Pain while trying to protect Naruto, though she survives.

Kiba Inuzuka.summary: Kiba loses to Naruto in the Chunin Exam preliminaries, falling for Naruto's shadow clone trick.
Kiba is defeated by Sakon and Ukon during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, needing to be saved.
Kiba and Sakura engage in training matches, with battles ending in draws.

Shino Aburame.summary: Shino defeats Kankurō in the Chunin Exam preliminaries using his insect techniques.

Tenten.summary: Tenten loses to Temari in the Chunin Exam preliminaries, being easily defeated.
Tenten assists in the fight against Kakuzu, with the battle ending inconclusively.

Kurenai Yūhi.summary: Kurenai is defeated by Itachi's genjutsu, being easily outmatched.
Kurenai fights Kisame, with the battle ending inconclusively.

Asuma Sarutobi.summary: Asuma is defeated by Itachi, being easily outmatched by the Uchiha's abilities.
Asuma fights Kisame, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Asuma is killed by Kakuzu and Hidan, sacrificing himself to protect his students.
Asuma is killed by Hidan using his ritual technique, though he manages to damage Hidan.

Yamato.summary: Yamato is defeated by Sasuke during their encounter, being outmatched by Sasuke's new abilities.
Yamato fights Kabuto, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Yamato and Naruto engage in training matches, with battles ending in draws.
Yamato and Sai engage in training matches, with battles ending in draws.

Sai.summary: Sai is defeated by Sasuke during their first encounter, being easily outmatched.
Sai fights Deidara, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Sai fights Sasori, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Sai and Yamato engage in training matches, with battles ending in draws.
Sai and Ino engage in training matches, with battles ending in draws.

Jiraiya.summary: Jiraiya and Orochimaru fight multiple times throughout their lives, with most battles ending in draws.
Jiraiya and Tsunade engage in sparring matches, with battles ending in draws.
Jiraiya fights Itachi, with the battle ending inconclusively as Itachi retreats.
Jiraiya is killed by Pain (Nagato) while gathering information in the Hidden Rain Village.
Jiraiya fights Hanzō during the Second Great Ninja War, with the battle ending in a draw.

Orochimaru.summary: Orochimaru kills the Third Hokage during the Konoha Crush, though Hiruzen seals Orochimaru's arms.
Orochimaru and Jiraiya fight multiple times throughout their lives, with most battles ending in draws.
Orochimaru and Tsunade fight, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Orochimaru encounters Naruto during the Chunin Exams, placing a seal on him.
Orochimaru is defeated by Sasuke when Sasuke takes over his body.
Orochimaru is easily defeated by Itachi's genjutsu, being sealed within Itachi's Susanoo.
Orochimaru is absorbed by Kabuto, who gains Orochimaru's powers.
Orochimaru defeats Anko, his former student, during the Chunin Exams.

Tsunade.summary: Tsunade fights Orochimaru, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Tsunade defeats Kabuto, though she struggles due to her hemophobia.
Tsunade is defeated by Madara during the Fourth Great Ninja War, being cut in half.
Tsunade and Jiraiya engage in sparring matches, with battles ending in draws.
Tsunade fights Nagato's Pain, with the battle ending inconclusively.

Itachi Uchiha.summary: Itachi defeats Kakashi using Tsukuyomi, putting Kakashi in a coma.
Itachi easily defeats Kurenai's genjutsu, showcasing his superior abilities.
Itachi defeats Asuma, easily outmatching the jonin.
Itachi fights Jiraiya, but retreats to avoid a prolonged battle.
Itachi fights Sasuke, but allows himself to be defeated, revealing the truth about the Uchiha massacre.
Itachi easily defeats Orochimaru using genjutsu, sealing him within his Susanoo.
Itachi, with Sasuke's help, defeats Kabuto using Izanami, ending the Impure World Reincarnation.
Itachi defeats Deidara easily, causing Deidara to join the Akatsuki.

Kisame Hoshigaki.summary: Kisame fights Asuma, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Kisame is defeated by Guy multiple times, eventually being killed by Guy.
Kisame is defeated by Killer B, being captured and later committing suicide.
Kisame and Itachi are partners, with their sparring matches ending in draws.
Kisame fights Kakashi, with the battle ending inconclusively.

Deidara.summary: Deidara defeats and captures Gaara, the Kazekage, using his explosive techniques.
Deidara fights Naruto, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Deidara is defeated by Sasuke, forcing him to use a suicide attack that fails.
Deidara is easily defeated by Itachi, causing him to join the Akatsuki.
Deidara defeats and captures Han, the Five-Tails jinchuriki.

Sasori.summary: Sasori is defeated by Sakura and Chiyo, with his core being destroyed.
Sasori defeats Kankurō, poisoning him with his puppets.
Sasori is defeated by Chiyo and Sakura, though Chiyo sacrifices herself.

Kakuzu.summary: Kakuzu kills Asuma alongside Hidan, taking his heart.
Kakuzu fights Kakashi, with the battle ending inconclusively until Naruto arrives.
Kakuzu is defeated by Naruto using the Wind Release: Rasenshuriken.
Kakuzu is defeated by Hashirama in the past, losing his original heart.

Hidan.summary: Hidan kills Asuma using his ritual technique, taking his blood and performing the curse.
Hidan is defeated by Shikamaru, who traps him in a forest and buries him alive.
Hidan defeats and captures Yugito, the Two-Tails jinchuriki.

Nagato.summary: Nagato, as Pain, kills Jiraiya while gathering information in the Hidden Rain Village.
Nagato, as Pain, kills Kakashi during the attack on Konoha.
Nagato is defeated by Naruto, who convinces him to revive the villagers.
Nagato, as Pain, defeats Hinata when she tries to protect Naruto.
Nagato defeats and captures Utakata, the Six-Tails jinchuriki.

Konan.summary: Konan fights Jiraiya alongside Nagato, though Jiraiya escapes.
Konan is killed by Obito after setting up a trap using paper bombs.

Obito Uchiha.summary: Obito is defeated by Minato during the Nine-Tails attack on Konoha.
Obito kills Konan after she sets up a trap, using Izanagi to survive.
Obito defeats and controls Yagura, the Four-Tails jinchuriki and Mizukage.
Obito is defeated by Naruto and the Allied Shinobi Forces after becoming the Ten-Tails jinchuriki.
Obito is defeated by Kakashi in their final battle, being pierced by Chidori.

Zabuza Momochi.summary: Zabuza is defeated by Kakashi in the Land of Waves arc, dying to protect Haku.
Zabuza defeats Haku in training, though Haku was holding back.

Haku.summary: Haku fights Sasuke, protecting Zabuza and awakening Sasuke's Sharingan.
Haku fights Naruto, with the battle ending when Haku sacrifices himself.
Haku is defeated by Kakashi, sacrificing himself to save Zabuza.

Kimimaro.summary: Kimimaro defeats Rock Lee during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, though Lee opens multiple gates.
Kimimaro is defeated by Gaara, dying from his illness before the battle ends.
Kimimaro defeats Naruto during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, though Naruto was exhausted.

Kidōmaru.summary: Kidōmaru is defeated by Neji during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, being killed by Neji's Gentle Fist.

Tayuya.summary: Tayuya is defeated by Shikamaru during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, being trapped by his shadow.
Tayuya is defeated by Temari, who arrives to help Shikamaru.

Jirōbō.summary: Jirōbō is defeated by Choji during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, being killed by Choji's Expansion Jutsu.

Sakon and Ukon.summary: Sakon and Ukon defeat Kiba during the Sasuke Retrieval arc, nearly killing him.
Sakon and Ukon are defeated by Kankurō, who arrives to help Kiba.

Hiruzen Sarutobi.summary: Hiruzen is killed by Orochimaru during the Konoha Crush, though he seals Orochimaru's arms.

Minato Namikaze.summary: Minato defeats Obito during the Nine-Tails attack on Konoha, using his Flying Thunder God technique.
Minato fights the Fourth Raikage, with the battle ending in a draw.
Minato fights Killer B, with the battle ending in a draw.

Tobirama Senju.summary: Tobirama fights Madara during their lifetimes, with battles ending in draws.

A (Fourth Raikage).summary: The Fourth Raikage fights Sasuke at the Five Kage Summit, with the battle ending inconclusively.
The Fourth Raikage fights Naruto, with the battle ending in a draw.
The Fourth Raikage fights Minato, with the battle ending in a draw.

Killer B.summary: Killer B defeats Kisame, capturing him and forcing him to commit suicide.
Killer B trains Naruto, with their sparring matches ending in draws.
Killer B defeats Sasuke and his team, nearly killing Sasuke.
Killer B fights Minato, with the battle ending in a draw.

Ōnoki.summary: Ōnoki fights his former teacher Mū during the Fourth Great Ninja War, with the battle ending in a draw.
Ōnoki is defeated by Madara during the Fourth Great Ninja War, being overwhelmed by Madara's power.

Mei Terumī.summary: Mei fights Sasuke at the Five Kage Summit, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Mei is defeated by Madara during the Fourth Great Ninja War, being overwhelmed by his power.

Gengetsu Hōzuki.summary: Gengetsu fights Gaara during the Fourth Great Ninja War, with the battle ending in a draw.
Gengetsu fights Ōnoki during the Fourth Great Ninja War, with the battle ending in a draw.

Danzō Shimura.summary: Danzō is killed by Sasuke, avenging Itachi and the Uchiha clan.
Danzō steals Shisui's eye, leading to Shisui's death.

Kabuto Yakushi.summary: Kabuto absorbs Orochimaru, gaining his powers and becoming stronger.
Kabuto is defeated by Tsunade, though she struggles due to her hemophobia.
Kabuto is defeated by Itachi and Sasuke using Izanami, ending the Impure World Reincarnation.
Kabuto is defeated by Sasuke and Itachi using Izanami.
Kabuto fights Naruto during the Konoha Crush, with the battle ending inconclusively.
Kabuto fights Yamato, with the battle ending inconclusively.

Chiyo.summary: Chiyo, with Sakura's help, defeats Sasori, sacrificing herself in the process.

Anko Mitarashi.summary: Anko is defeated by Orochimaru during the Chunin Exams, being easily outmatched by her former teacher.
Anko fights Kabuto, with the battle ending inconclusively.

Temari.summary: Temari easily defeats Tenten in the Chunin Exam preliminaries.
Temari wins against Shikamaru in the Chunin Exams, though Shikamaru forfeits.
Temari defeats Tayuya, arriving to help Shikamaru during the Sasuke Retrieval arc.

Kankurō.summary: Kankurō loses to Shino in the Chunin Exam preliminaries.
Kankurō is defeated and poisoned by Sasori.
Kankurō defeats Sakon and Ukon, arriving to help Kiba during the Sasuke Retrieval arc.

Madara Uchiha.summary: Madara is defeated by Hashirama at the Valley of the End, ending their rivalry.
Madara is nearly defeated by Guy's Eighth Gate, though Guy collapses from exhaustion.
Madara is defeated by Naruto and Sasuke, though the battle ends when Kaguya appears.
Madara fights Tobirama during their lifetimes, with battles ending in draws.

Hashirama Senju.summary: Hashirama defeats Madara at the Valley of the End, ending their rivalry.
Hashirama defeats Kakuzu in the past, taking his original heart.

Kaguya Ōtsutsuki.summary: Kaguya is sealed by Naruto and Sasuke, ending the threat she posed to the world.
Kaguya is sealed by Naruto and Sasuke, ending the threat she posed to the world.

Mū.summary: Mū fights his former student Ōnoki during the Fourth Great Ninja War, with the battle ending in a draw.
Mū fights Gaara during the Fourth Great Ninja War, with the battle ending in a draw.

A (Third Raikage).summary: The Third Raikage is defeated by Naruto during the Fourth Great Ninja War, with Naruto redirecting his own attack.

Rasa.summary: Rasa is killed by Orochimaru during the Konoha Crush.

Fugaku Uchiha.summary: Fugaku is killed by Itachi during the Uchiha massacre, though he accepts his fate.

Shisui Uchiha.summary: Shisui is killed by Danzō, who steals his eye, leading to Shisui's suicide.

Yagura Karatachi.summary: Yagura is controlled by Obito, becoming a puppet Mizukage.

Utakata.summary: Utakata is defeated and captured by Pain (Nagato), the Six-Tails jinchuriki.

Yugito Nii.summary: Yugito is defeated and captured by Hidan, the Two-Tails jinchuriki.

Rōshi.summary: Rōshi is defeated and captured by Kisame, the Four-Tails jinchuriki.

Han.summary: Han is defeated and captured by Deidara, the Five-Tails jinchuriki.

Fū.summary: Fū is defeated and captured by Hidan, the Seven-Tails jinchuriki.

Hanzō.summary: Hanzō fights Jiraiya during the Second Great Ninja War, with the battle ending in a draw.
